title: At Żabka (Convenience Store)
description: You need to buy water, ask for the price, and request a receipt. Learn essential shopping vocabulary.
context_prompt: A customer shopping at a Żabka convenience store in Poland, buying basic items and asking for receipt

title: Ordering Uber
description: Confirm your pickup location and destination with the driver. Practice giving addresses and directions.
context_prompt: A passenger confirming pickup location and destination address with an Uber driver in Polish

title: At the Restaurant
description: Order food and drinks, ask for recommendations, and request the bill.
context_prompt: A customer at a Polish restaurant ordering food, asking for recommendations, and requesting the bill

title: At the Post Office (Poczta)
description: Send a package or letter, buy stamps, and ask about delivery times.
context_prompt: A customer at a Polish post office sending a package internationally and asking about delivery

title: Buying Train Tickets
description: Purchase train tickets at a station, ask about platforms and departure times.
context_prompt: A traveler buying train tickets at a Polish railway station, asking about schedules and platforms

title: At the Doctor's Office
description: Describe symptoms to a doctor and understand basic medical instructions.
context_prompt: A patient describing health symptoms to a Polish doctor and receiving medical advice

title: Renting an Apartment
description: Discuss apartment details, rent price, and contract terms with a landlord.
context_prompt: A potential tenant discussing apartment rental terms, utilities, and contract with a Polish landlord
